identity.title: Printing A Sequence of Repeated Numbers (Case 2)

content.prompt: Construct a program that receives an integer N from the user and prints a sequence of space-separated numbers from 1 to N such that the N-th number in the sequence is repeated N times. For example, if N is 6, the program will print the following sequence:\n1 22 333 4444 55555 666666
